channel.title: Animation Sequence (antlion)
channel.description:
Hey guys, I'm having some difficulties and I thought this might be a good place to look for help.
I'm trying to make a scene in a video regarding an Antlion, but I'm not sure how to control him. I set everything up like I usually do in Faceposer, making my separate characters, their gestures, facial movements etc. Then I put them on my Hammer map as I usually do too. Just adding the Generic_Actors, scene, and trigger. Everything works great... Except the antlion. It doesn't even acknowledge there's a problem at all, the antlion just stands with an idle and doesn't do his sequence. Does anyone know a fix to this problem? I would greatly appreciate the help!
